text:
@NYGovCuomo NY Democrat Governor Andrew Cuomo: “We’ve been more aggressive than any state in nursing home precautions. We have been smart.”

5,600+ have died in NY nursing homes after Cuomo’s policy forced nursing homes to accept coronavirus patients
